Carbon Zerow

One boat. Four rowers. Carbon neutral Atlantic crossing. Donate in £'s Join us on this journey and support our campaign by making a donation in £'s or $'s. Donate over $/£100 and get your name/logo/quote on the boat! The larger the donation the more space you get!
